remarks: The action of a particular group element is a permutation of the base set.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 11-Aug-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)
statement:
gapm.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
gapm.2 $e |- F = ( x e. Y |-> ( A .(+) x ) ) $.
gapm $p |- ( ( .(+) e. ( G GrpAct Y ) /\ A e. X ) -> F : Y -1-1-onto-> Y ) $.
$d .(+) x $.
$d A x $.
$d G x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
